## Description {#details}

A grouping of pointers.

A single memcheck is required between two groups.

Definition at line 408 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-h">LoopAccessAnalysis.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### addPointer() {#a2a9ec6fa93583e6d3806bc859a9ee94e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RuntimeCheckingPtrGroup::addPointer (unsigned Index, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimepointerchecking">RuntimePointerChecking</a> &amp; RtCheck)</>}>
Tries to add the pointer recorded in RtCheck at index <code>Index</code> to this pointer checking group.

We can only add a pointer to a checking group if we will still be able to get the upper and lower bounds of the check. Returns true in case of success, false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-h/#l00419">419</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-h">LoopAccessAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#l00411">411</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp">LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### addPointer() {#a3c9789fd8d2eac348a6b65fad0d10d5f}
